title: The Adventures of Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy
description: By the power of Neptune, Mermaid Man with his young associate Barnacle Boy fight for all creatures that live in the sea against the forces of evil.
quote: Evil canâ€™t park here between the hours of 6am and 12pm.

alt3: Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy as older men, their appearances changed dramatically with age
alt4: the heroes stand on a car and face off with Kelp Thing
